title: Project CARS 3: Deluxe Edition – v1.0.0.0.0705 + 5 DLCs
body:
Project CARS 3: Deluxe Edition – v1.0.0.0.0705 + 5 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D, Cars
Companies: Slightly Mad Studios, Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 45.2 GB
Repack Size: 19.9 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors (FIXED Repack)

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Standalone Fix for bad installation (for previous repack)

Download this fixed fg-07.bin, replace the old one with it and reinstall the game
https://pastefg.hermietkreeft.site/?fb687415ad5e46e5#CyJEiLWduVCRg6D4gQvk85MFhQrQtkFhSGbEZDLYvqFv

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Project.CARS.3.Deluxe.Edition-CODEX ISO release: codex-project.cars.3.deluxe.edition.iso (48,565,551,104 bytes)
  • Game version is: v1.0.0.0.0705; 5 DLCs are included and activated
  • Alternative 3DM crack is available in NoDVD folder after installation, recommended for Oculus users
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 45.2 to 19.9 GB)
  • Installation takes from 15 minutes (16-threads CPU + SSD) to 50 minutes (4-threads + HDD)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 49.5 GB (58 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses compression libraries by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

OWN YOUR JOURNEY

Game Features

  • 200+ elite-brand race & road cars
  • 120+ global tracks
  • Wide set of race conversion kits
  • Race to earn Credits & XP
  • Buy & own 100s of cars
  • Upgrade cars with realistic performance parts
  • Customize your car liveries with racing- & community-inspired elements
  • Personalize your drivers
  • Fully scalable assists for all skill levels
  • Convincing & fun handling
  • 24-hour cycle, dynamic all-seasons, all-weather racing
  • Unrivalled Controller Experience
  • Visceral sense of speed
  • Intense crash effects & car-contact
  • Enhanced AI

Included DLCs

  • Style Pack
  • Legends Pack
  • Power Pack
  • Electric Pack
  • Ignition Pack

Backwards compatibility

This repack IS slightly backwards compatible with my previous repack of PC3. You can rehash fg-02.bin and save 1.1 GB of traffic.
